title: pAlayAshu mAm
sahitya:
pAlayAshu mAm paradEvatE


anupallavi

  kAlakAla vallabhE lalitE ati lalitE


caraNam 1    gAna vinOdini niranjani dAna pradAyini ranjani 
manOnnatim dEhi mA shivE mAnavati himagiri tanayE
    caraNam 2    kanjalOcanE kAmAkSi pancAkSara vaibhavamuditE 
kAmakOTi pITha vAsini shyAmakrSNa paripAlita janani
